mdui:UIInfo.mdui:Description: Online access to Nature Publishing Group journals
ProQuest provides subscription access to numerous premium technical journals, dissertations and other information databases.

AttributeConsumingService.ServiceDescription: ProQuest provides subscription access to numerous premium technical journals, dissertations and other information databases.

mdui:UIInfo.mdui:DisplayName: Clarivate Analytics SP (Web of Knowledge & EndNote Web)
mdui:UIInfo.mdui:Description: Explore literature in the sciences, social sciences, arts and humanities and publish bibliographies.

IOPscience is an online service for journal content published by IOP Publishing. IOPscience embraces innovative technologies to make it easier for researchers to access scientific, technical and medical content.
